com.verilion.display.jsp.tags
Class RandomImageTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      com.verilion.display.jsp.tags.BaseTag
          com.verilion.display.jsp.tags.RandomImageTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
public class RandomImageTag
extends BaseTag

Displays random image from list. All images must be in same directory. Must be at least two images in list, separated by commas, no spaces.

Author:
tsawler
